constraint.description: API/SPI types must not extend/implement internal types.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (clazz)-[:`EXTENDS`]->(supertype) WHERE NOT clazz.fqn =~".*impl.*" AND NOT clazz.fqn =~".*test.*" AND supertype.fqn =~".*impl.*" RETURN clazz UNION ALL MATCH (clazz:`Class`)-[:`IMPLEMENTS`]->(supertype) WHERE NOT clazz.fqn =~".*impl.*" AND NOT clazz.fqn =~".*test.*" AND supertype.fqn =~".*impl.*" RETURN clazz

constraint.description: API/SPI methods must not expose internal types.
constraint.cypher:
// return values MATCH (clazz)-[:`DECLARES`]->(method)-[:`RETURNS`]->(returntype) WHERE NOT clazz.fqn =~".*impl.*" AND NOT clazz.fqn =~".*test.*" AND (method.visibility="public" OR method.visibility="protected") AND returntype.fqn =~ ".*impl.*" RETURN method
// parameters UNION ALL MATCH (clazz)-[:`DECLARES`]->(method)-[:`HAS`]->(parameter)-[:`OF_TYPE`]->(parametertype) WHERE NOT clazz.fqn =~".*impl.*" AND NOT clazz.fqn =~".*test.*" AND (method.visibility="public" OR method.visibility="protected") AND parametertype.fqn =~ ".*impl.*" RETURN method

constraint.description: API/SPI fields must not expose internal types.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (clazz)-[:`DECLARES`]->(field)-[:`OF_TYPE`]->(fieldtype) WHERE NOT clazz.fqn =~".*impl.*" AND NOT clazz.fqn =~".*test.*" AND (field.visibility="public" OR field.visibility="protected") AND fieldtype.fqn =~ ".*impl.*" RETURN field
